寒害: (かんがい) - damage from cold weather
寒寒: (さむざむ) - wintry/very cold-looking (e.g. landscape); bleak (e.g. room, street)/desolate/empty (of furnishings)
寒寒しい: (さむざむしい) - bleak; chilly; dreary
寒寒した心: (さむざむしたこころ) - feeling listless
寒帯前線: (かんたいぜんせん) - polar front
寒帯前線ジェット気流: (かんたいぜんせんジェットきりゅう) - polar front jet stream
寒帯林: (かんたいりん) - taiga; boreal forest; Arctic forest
寒帯気団: (かんたいきだん) - polar air mass
寒明け: (かんあけ) - the beginning of spring
寒暑: (かんしょ) - hot and cold; summer and winter
寒暖: (かんだん) - heat and cold; (extremes of) temperature
寒月: (かんげつ) - wintry moon; a winter month
寒村: (かんそん) - deserted village; poor village
寒桜: (カンザクラ) - Prunus kanzakura (species of winter-blooming cherry tree); Chinese primrose (Primula sinensis)
寒梅: (かんばい) - plum tree which blossoms in winter/early-flowering plum tree; early plum blossoms
寒梅粉: (かんばいこ) - flour made from cooked glutinous rice
寒椿: (かんつばき) - camellia-like plant native to China
寒極: (かんきょく) - a place of extreme cold
寒武利亜: (カンブリア) - Cambria (old name for Wales)
寒気: (かんき) - (さむけ only) chill/the shivers/shivering fit; (usu. かんき) cold/coldness/cold air
寒気凛々: (かんきりんりん) - (yoji) it (the weather) being piercing (bitterly) cold
寒気凛凛: (かんきりんりん) - (yoji) it (the weather) being piercing (bitterly) cold
寒気団: (かんきだん) - a cold air mass
寒気立つ: (さむけだつ) - to feel cold; to have a chill
寒水: (かんすい) - cold water; water in midwinter
寒水石: (かんすいせき) - whitish marble (from northern Ibaraki); white limestone
寒点: (かんてん) - cold points (of the skin)
寒熱: (かんねつ) - cold and heat; chills and fever
寒熱往来: (かんねつおうらい) - alternating chills and fever
寒紅梅: (かんこうばい) - winter plum tree with reddish blossoms
寒緋桜: (カンヒザクラ) - Taiwan cherry (Prunus campanulata); winter cherry tree
寒色: (かんしょく) - cold color; cold colour
寒苦: (かんく) - suffering caused by the cold
寒苦鳥: (かんくとり) - imaginary bird living in the Indian Himalayas (used as a Buddhist metaphor)
寒菊: (カンキク) - winter chrysanthemum (Chrysanthemum indicum) (hardy chrysanth variety); Chinese aster
寒葵: (カンアオイ) - Asarum nipponicum (species of wild ginger)
寒蛩: (かんきょう) - chirping of crickets in late autumn
寒蜆: (かんしじみ) - Shijimi clam caught during winter
寒蝉: (かんぜん) - cicadas which sing in late autumn
寒造り: (かんづくり) - made in the winter (sake)
寒郷: (かんきょう) - poor isolated village; one's hometown
寒酸: (かんさん) - suffering in poverty; abject poverty
寒雲: (かんうん) - clouds in midwinter; cold winter clouds
寒雷: (かんらい) - winter thunder; thunderstorm accompanying a cold front
寒露: (かんろ) - late-autumn or early-winter dew; "cold dew" solar term (approx. Oct. 8)
寒餅: (かんもち) - mochi made in winter
寒鮒: (かんぶな) - (best season for eating them)  crucian carp caught in midwinter
寒鯉: (かんごい) - koi carp caught during the cold season
寒鯛: (かんだい) - Asian sheepshead wrasse (Semicossyphus reticulatus); scarbreast tuskfin (Choerodon azurio)
寒鰤: (かんぶり) - (regarded as delicious because of its higher fat content) yellowtail caught during the cold season; cold yellowtail
寓する: (ぐうする) - to reside temporarily; to imply
寓居: (ぐうきょ) - temporary abode; staying on a temporary basis
寓意劇: (ぐういげき) - morality play; allegorical play
寓意小説: (ぐういしょうせつ) - allegory; allegorical tale
寓目: (ぐうもく) - fastening one's eyes upon
寔に: (まことに) - indeed; really; absolutely; truly; actually; very; quite
寛ぎ: (くつろぎ) - ease; relaxation; comfort; unwinding
寛ぐ: (くつろぐ) - to relax; to feel at home
寛げる: (くつろげる) - to loose; to ease; to relax
寛仁大度: (かんじんたいど) - (yoji) being generous, benevolent and magnanimous in disposition
寛大: (kandai) - tolerante, generoso, indulgente, de mente aberta, magnânimo
寛容: (você pode) - tolerance, open-mindedness, forbearance, generosity, magnanimity
寛寛: (かんかん) - looking cool and collect; with an air of perfect composure
